step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed and focus on a comfortable posture.
Nice stretch overhead. Ensure your fingers are spread wide to maximize engagement.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale as you tighten.
Excellent exhale and relaxation. Focus on a smooth return to the overhead position.
You completed the first repetition well. Let's maintain this form for the next set.
Good posture for the second rep. Try to keep your elbows slightly straighter as you begin.
Keep up the good work with the overhead stretch. Ensure your fingers are open.
Well done squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to breathe in deeply during this phase.
Good control on the way down. Focus on a full exhale as you relax.
You finished the second rep! Your movements are becoming more fluid. Keep practicing this form.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Focus on keeping your shoulders relaxed and squeezing your shoulder blades together as you make a fist. Remember to inhale when tightening and exhale when relaxing your arms overhead.
